text_logic_form: The area of the parallelogram $ABCD$ is $100$ square units.
Find the length of the base $CD$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The area of the parallelogram $ABCD$ is $100$ square units.
Find the length of the base $CD$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AB$ is $x+15$ units.
The length of the line $BE$ is $x$ units.
Point $E$ lies on the line connecting $D$ and $C$.
The line $BE$ is perpendicular to the line $CE$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AD$, $BC$, $BE$, $CE$, and $DC$, forming the parallelogram $ABCD$.
The line $DE$ is parallel to the line $AB$.
